name: Hokaku: Catch & Feed
description:
Intro-

Welcome to Hokaku, a Pokemon-like game where you use capsules, food and gadgets to catch plenty of different creatures. 

How to play -

- wasd or arrows to move

- space, e or z to interact

- p, x or esc while being outdoors to open the pause menu (Remember to save the game!)

- Catching creatures will give you money that you can use to buy some cool things.

- Food is also an important resource! It allows you to catch creatures more easily and even evolve some of them. Find/buy the right ones and any creature will be yours.

Content -

The current jam version has:

-  2 explorable areas.

- 24 different creatures.

- A main city with some interesting buildings and people.

Important-

In case one of the downloadable version's resolution is not 1:1, close the game and open it again to fix it.

Credits-

Music by QuirkyMercenaryDeer
